macro.name: Compendium.pf2e-jb2a-macros.Macros.Opacity 1
macro.args: Do not remove this macro! This turns your token visible after your animation finishes (or during it, depends on when the macro is ran). Replace this with your own version or don't remove it, unless you want invisible tokens.
